aka: 同志牛仔竞技赛的直男岁月
this_title: Queens & Cowboys: A Straight Year on the Gay Rodeo
trans_title: 同志牛仔竞技赛的直男岁月
introduction: QUEENS & COWBOYS: A STRAIGHT YEAR ON THE GAY RODEO chronicles a complete season of the International Gay Rodeo Association. Roping and riding across north America for the past 30 years, the IGRA's courageous cowboys and cowgirls brave challenges both in and out of the arena on their quest to qualify for the World Finals at the end of the season. And along the way, they'll bust every stereotype in the book.
foreign_title: Queens & Cowboys: A Straight Year on the Gay Rodeo
